breaking.name: 公式リリース（英）
breaking.query: (from:OpenAI OR from:GoogleAI OR from:AnthropicAI OR from:MetaAI OR from:xai) ("release" OR "launch" OR "update" OR "announcing" OR "new") -is:retweet lang:en

breaking.name: 研究・論文（英）
breaking.query: ("paper" OR "arxiv" OR "preprint" OR "benchmark" OR "SOTA" OR "state of the art") ("LLM" OR "diffusion" OR "multimodal" OR "reasoning") -is:retweet lang:en

breaking.name: プロダクト新作（英）
breaking.query: ("new tool" OR "just shipped" OR "now supports" OR "available" OR "beta") ("AI" OR "LLM" OR "agent" OR "image" OR "video") -is:retweet lang:en

breaking.name: 規制・炎上・議論（英）
breaking.query: ("copyright" OR "lawsuit" OR "regulation" OR "policy" OR "ban" OR "ethics") ("AI" OR "LLM" OR "deepfake") -is:retweet lang:en

breaking.name: 日本語ニュース
breaking.query: ("生成AI" OR "AI" OR "LLM") ("発表" OR "リリース" OR "アップデート" OR "新機能" OR "提供開始") -is:retweet lang:ja

practical.name: 開発・コード・OSS（英）
practical.query: ("open source" OR "repo" OR "github" OR "library" OR "framework" OR "API") ("LLM" OR "agents" OR "RAG" OR "vector database" OR "prompt") -is:retweet lang:en

practical.name: エージェント/RAG/運用（英）
practical.query: ("agent" OR "agents" OR "RAG" OR "retrieval" OR "orchestration" OR "workflow" OR "tool use") ("LLM" OR "AI") -is:retweet lang:en

practical.name: AI×ビジネス/収益（英）
practical.query: ("revenue" OR "MRR" OR "customers" OR "pricing" OR "growth" OR "startup") ("AI" OR "LLM" OR "agents") -is:retweet lang:en

practical.name: セキュリティ/安全（英）
practical.query: ("jailbreak" OR "prompt injection" OR "model security" OR "alignment" OR "safety") ("LLM" OR "AI") -is:retweet lang:en

practical.name: 日本語活用事例（実務/副業）
practical.query: ("生成AI" OR "AI活用" OR "ChatGPT" OR "Claude" OR "Gemini") ("業務効率化" OR "自動化" OR "副業" OR "マーケ" OR "コンテンツ" OR "開発") -is:retweet lang:ja

practical.name: 優先インフルエンサー（日本）
practical.query: (from:SuguruKun_ai OR from:taishiyade OR from:ceo_tommy1 OR from:rute1203d OR from:The_AGI_WAY OR from:unikoukokun OR from:kamui_qai) -is:retweet
